text: The flag of Tuxtla Gutiérrez () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Related pages== * Tuxtla Gutiérrez ==References== Tuxtla Gutiérrez Category:Tuxtla Gutiérrez Tuxtla Gutiérrez Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Tuxtla Gutiérrez
